name: Stick Flick - Top Free Swipe & Jump Game
name_original: Stick Flick - Top Free Swipe & Jump Game
description:
Run, jump and swipe to help this cool stick hero survive.

Draw trampolines to create a bouncing platform for him to jump to safety, if you don’t he will fall into the crevice below.

This uniquely challenging swipe control system has a brilliant twist on the endless runner genre. If you are fan of endless runners and platformers, this breathless, addictive fun game is for you.
